text: William king gretet Aylmer biscop and Rauf Erl and alle mine theines on Suthfolc and on Northfolc frendlike, and ic kythe ihu that ic wille that Baltewyne Abbot birede alle the londe me to haunde that tho men atthen the on orreste stonde togenes me and ther ofslagen weren the hoerden into Edmundes sokne.
And ic wille that tho men ben nu that abbotes men so here helderne e weren and his forgengle heratforn him hauede.
And nelle thafian that him ani man of hande teo ani thing the hic him unnen habbe.
